name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AdDaptive Intelligence Ad Screen Capture Tool

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make display ad mock-ups a thing of the past with the AdDaptive Intelligence Ad Screen Capture Tool

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The AdDaptive Screen Capture Tool allows publishers, agencies and marketers to quickly identify available ad placements on a webpage and inject campaign display ads for mock-up purposes.  Designed to solve the problem of capturing onsite or “in-the-wild” display ads, the Screen Capture Tool is part of the AdDaptive Platform and is fully integrated with Google Ad Manager and Xandr.
